summary: 9/15/15- BROUGHT IN FOR MISFIRING AND ROUGH IDLING TO LUPIENT KIA BROOKLYN PARK, MN.  11/19/15 - BROUGHT IN FOR ROUGH IDLING AND ENGINE STALLING WHILE DRIVING TO LUPIENT.  CLEANED ENGINE GROUNDS.  12/30/15 - LUPIENT - BROUGHT IN FOR MISFIRES AND CEL ON; REPLACED INJECTOR AND COMPUTER.  7/13/16 - LUPIENT - BROUGHT IN CEL ON, STARTS HARD, IDLES ROUGH; REPLACED INJECTOR (SAME INJECTOR); 8/18/16 - LUPIENT - TOWED IN - WON'T START CEL ON; REPAIR PIN TENSION; 8/17/16 LUPIENT - WAS IN FOR THE SAME PROBLEM AND WAS TOLD THAT I DIDN'T PUT THE GAS CAP ON TIGHT ENOUGH.  1/11/17 - LUPIENT - TOWED IN WOULD NOT START; LIGHTS AND HORN WERE FLASHING. TOWED FROM HOME DRIVEWAY.  WAS TOLD IT WAS THE KEY FOB BATTERY.  6/12/17 - BARNET KIA - TOWED IN; CAR STALLED AND WOULD NOT RESTART.  STALLED AT RED STOP LIGHT LEFT TURN LANE. COULD NOT REPLICATE THE PROBLEM AND CARE STARTED UP ON 6/14/17 FINE.  TOLD TO COME GET MY CAR.  7/17/17 -  BARNET KIA - VEHICLE TOWED; STALLED AT RED STOP LIGHT LEFT TURN LANE.  HAVE NO IDEA WHAT IS GOING TO HAPPEN BECAUSE NO ONE IS CONTACTING ME FROM KIA.
